author: Staff Reporter
text:
As many as 12 persons sustained injuries when a TNSTC bus and a mini bus collided in Vettumani junction near Marthandam on Saturday afternoon. According to police, the TNSTC bus from Kollancode proceeding to Marthandam dashed against the mini bus. In the impact, 12 persons were injured and the windscreens of the buses were damaged.

The injured persons were taken to the Government Hospital in Kuzhithurai and Kanyakumari Government Medical College Hospital. Marthandam police have registered a case and are further investigating.
title: 12 injured as buses collide
